detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#84-86)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#46)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#47)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#68-77)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#52)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#136-138)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#123-128)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DigitalTwinAgreement.sol#54)
